truth_definition.macro_truth: Truth = coherence between expected probability and observed team performance variance.
truth_definition.micro_truth: Individual performance (rolling stats + form drift) governs short-frame coherence.
truth_definition.temporal_truth: Truth stabilizes when variance equilibrium is achieved over rolling 14/30 windows.

expected_behavior: Sports triads validate projections only when variance drift stays below entropy tolerance and lattice coherence holds.
